cards.name: Fruitcake Elemental
cards.text:
Fruitcake Elemental is indestructible.

At the end of your turn, Fruitcake Elemental deals 7 damage to you.

{3}: Target player gains control of Fruitcake Elemental.
cards.originalText:
Fruitcake Elemental is indestructible.

At the end of your turn, Fruitcake Elemental deals 7 damage to you.

{3}: Target player gains control of Fruitcake Elemental.
cards.flavor: Experiments intended to create the perfect holiday emissary resulted in a substance harder than darksteel and a fraction as merry.

cards.name: Gifts Given
cards.text: Search target opponent's library for four cards with different names and reveal them. That player chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into the player's graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
cards.originalText: Search target opponent's library for four cards with different names and reveal them. That player chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into the player's graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Evil Presents
cards.text: Put a creature card from your hand into play under target opponent's control. That creature attacks each turn if able... and always attacks its controller.
cards.originalText: Put a creature card from your hand into play under target opponent's control. That creature attacks each turn if able... and always attacks its controller.

cards.name: Season's Beatings
cards.text: Family gathering — Each creature target player controls deals damage equal to its power to another random creature that player controls.
cards.originalText: Family gathering — Each creature target player controls deals damage equal to its power to another random creature that player controls.
cards.flavor: Arriving home, he suddenly longed for the bloodsoaked battlefields behind him.

cards.name: Snow Mercy
cards.text:
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a globe counter on it.

{T}, {Q}, {T}, {Q}, {T}: Tap all creatures with globe counters on them.
cards.originalText:
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a globe counter on it.

{T}, {Q}, {T}, {Q}, {T}: Tap all creatures with globe counters on them.
cards.flavor: WARNING: Shake gently. Contents may cause choking, hypothermia, and/or planar invasion.

cards.name: Yule Ooze
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy another nonland permanent chosen at random, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on Yule Ooze equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.

{R}{G}, Eat some food: Regenerate Yule Ooze.
cards.originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy another nonland permanent chosen at random, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on Yule Ooze equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.

{R}{G}, Eat some food: Regenerate Yule Ooze.
cards.flavor: It loves having family for dinner.

cards.name: Naughty
cards.text: Search another target player's library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle that player's library.
cards.originalText: Search another target player's library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle that player's library.

cards.name: Nice
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put it into another target player's hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.originalText: Search your library for a card and put it into another target player's hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Stocking Tiger
cards.text:
Stocking Tiger enters the battlefield with a sealed Magic booster pack under it.

When Stocking Tiger deals combat damage to a player, unwrap the booster pack and put it in your hand.
cards.originalText:
Stocking Tiger enters the battlefield with a sealed Magic booster pack under it.

When Stocking Tiger deals combat damage to a player, unwrap the booster pack and put it in your hand.
cards.flavor: Just hope yours isn't full of coal golems.
